data.text: We didn‚Äôt want to wait to write this until end of our holiday. We are staying in the room 18208. Last year, we also came here for our vacation and had some small issues but management team solved everything immediately and made our holiday better. This year, we were a bit worried what we had last year but starting from the first moment, everything is just perfect, there is nothing to criticize. This hotel is completely different than any hotel. I have stayed many hotels in my life, I am so picky and my expectations are always high and this hotel is already fulfilled my expectations even in 2 days. All the stuff is amazing. Cannot compare with last year. Everyone is ready to make you comfortable and satisfied. Best hotel restaurant experience in my life, there is no open buffet, all the restaurants are a la carte and it is all up to you what you want to eat and quality of the food is excellent. It is totally a A+ elite hotel. Do not compare any hotel before you come to Meraki. Everyone must have this experience. Special thanks to Mrs. Olena and Mr. Ayman. We will come again with no doubt.
data.title: Best Hotel Experience

data.text: Great experience! This guy in the Velocity restaurant was the coolest and friendliest bartender ever! üôåüèº‚ù§Ô∏è Staff was great, especially in Basilico restaurant. Food was great and also the location was 2min away from Soho square. I liked that there are different national restaurants and everything is super clean.
data.title: Coolest experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
First of all we would like to thank you for choosing Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh for your holidays. It was a pleasure for us to host you and on behalf of all team we would like to thank you for such valuable feedback.
Reading such a review brings a big smile on the faces of the Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh Team! We are glad to read your comments and we are pleased to know that we have been up to your expectations. We are looking forward to have you try our facilities again during a possible visit in the near future. Thank you for having chosen our resort as destination of your holiday, We look forward to welcoming you back to your second home in Egypt, Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh very soon.
With best regards,
Team of Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh
owner_response.author: White Hills Resort Sharm El Sheikh

data.text: Arrived to very friendly staff and the overall resort is very clean, the food was excellent and the staff in the bars and restaurants where always on hand when needing more food or drinks, yasser, amr and Mohammed are just a few names we can remember but all staff was outstanding would definitely recommend and ourselves will be going back again üåûüòÅ, on our trip on the pirate ship our tour guide Muhammad (jimmy) was very helpful in knowledge and accommodating our every need üòÅüåû
data.title: Lovely holiday at the Meraki üåûüòÅ

data.text: Meraki Top notch ! Incredible Atmosphere, tasty food (9 restaurants), good drinks and excellent service , all in one huge and well kept place ..all the staff members will take care of you and all your needs ‚Ä¶last but not least rooms are big with all the comfort and super iper clean...we will come back for sure !
data.title: Top notch

data.text: Beautiful resort, and the staff really go above and beyond. From reception to waiters, entertainment staff and cleaners, all so lovely. Great belly dance shows at night. The best food I‚Äôve ever had at an all inclusive. I had an amazing stay and will be returning!
data.title: An amazing stay
